text: <@U01ASFZL4UA> Custom User type properties are not allowed as form fields. Cloning from a single text field to a user field is also not possible, cause of the field type difference. I pretty much want to send in a User ID via a external contact form, but I just can't get the ID mapped to the user. (I could do this with for example a simple branch, but the User being used are too variable, employees come and go and too much to follow up)

I understand. Then, add single text field to form and fill it with value. Then trigger webhook to Integromat, then Google Sheets with all users value (2 row, name and email), search by usedID and then update contact record.
Yhea, I've done it before with custom code, but the client doesn't have access to that :grimacing: Thanks for the input, appreciated!
